titleStmt.title: Scrinia reserata a memorial offer'd to the great deservings of John Williams, D. D., who some time held the places of Ld Keeper of the Great Seal of England, Ld Bishop of Lincoln, and Ld Archbishop of York : containing a series of the most remarkable occurences and transactions of his life, in relation both to church and state / written by John Hacket ...
titleStmt.author: Hacket, John, 1592-1670.

titleStmt.title: Scrinia reserata a memorial offer'd to the great deservings of John Williams, D. D., who some time held the places of Ld Keeper of the Great Seal of England, Ld Bishop of Lincoln, and Ld Archbishop of York : containing a series of the most remarkable occurences and transactions of his life, in relation both to church and state / written by John Hacket ...
titleStmt.author: Hacket, John, 1592-1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Jones for Samuel Lowndes ...,

notesStmt.note: In two parts. Part 2 has special t.p.: A memorial offer'd to the great deservings of John Williams.
Reproduction of original in the Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
